title: Learn How to Get SUPER SLEEK Hair | Garnier Fructis
description:
Super sleek hair even in 97% humidity*? With paraben-free, Super Fruit Moroccan Argan Oil-infused Sleek & Shine, every wash leaves strands smoother and 2x stronger.  Watch to learn more about Fructis Sleek & Shine. 

*with Shampoo, Conditioner & Leave-In Treatment
